Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Brussels with a stay at The Pantone Hotel, minutes from Law Courts of Brussels and Horta Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Porte de Hal Museum and Place du Jeu de Balle.

Rooms
Stay in one of 61 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
    • Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Stay in one of 61 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes.

You'll be centrally located in Brussels with a stay at The Pantone Hotel, minutes from Law Courts of Brussels and Horta Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Porte de Hal Museum and Place du Jeu de Balle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Law Courts of Brussels - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Porte de Hal Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Place du Jeu de Balle - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Egmont Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Museum of Fantastic Arts - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Horta Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Place du Petit Sablon - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Notre Dame du Sablon - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Architecture Museum de Loge - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Place du Grand Sablon - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Management Centre Europe - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Notre Dame da la Chapelle - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
D'Ieteren Gallery - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Camille Lemonnier Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Royal Museums of Fine Arts of Belgium - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Brussels (ZYR-Brussels Midi Train Station) - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Brussels (BRU) - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi

The preferred airport for The Pantone Hotel is Brussels (BRU).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
    • Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).
